channel.title: Jtech
channel.description:
Back when there were simpler times, MacOS was 4 gigs, and there was world peace. The real question is, did we actually grow or just make MacOS 16 gigs bigger? This is Jtech, a RSS feed dedicated to delivering the latest tech news right as it happens
*The opinions in the Jtech blog does not express the opinions of the actual publisher. Opinions in this blog are total opinions, deal with it.
